p: Importantly, wild birds have been used for experimental WNV infections, not as a model for mammalian disease, but to assess pathogenesis and factors affecting viral evolution and transmission in the most relevant amplifying hosts [ 58, 60, 208, 209, 210, 211, 212, 213, 214, 215]. This use is crucial as cell culture and computer modelling are insufficient in their representation of complex living systems.
